note.p: Daughter of Francis Sacheverel Darwin. Born in Darley, Derbyshire, and lived in Derby with her sister Violetta Harriot Darwin for part of her adult life.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/3569/56/11)
Derbyshire, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1916 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2017)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 October 2017)
